name: Mini Golf Magic Blitz
description:
Get ready to add some magic to your Mini Golf fun! Putt your way through wonderful 3D mini golf courses set high in the sky. The precise touch controls make it easy to pick up and play. Swing your golf club and land the ball in the hole at the end of each course with the least strokes possible!

MAIN FEATURES:

• Precise Controls: Drag and release to control the strength and direction of each swing.
• Rewards Galore: Plan your course and collect the most Coins on the course to add more fun features!
• Extra Challenges: Take on the bonus goals on each course and prove your Mini Golf Wizardry.

Terms of Service and Privacy Policy:
